GPL과 관련된 infoQ의 글입니다.
Why GPL? As reported on InfoQ in the past, there were a number of tangible needs for an open source java. According to Sun, a GPL license accomplishes two major objectives:driving more volume and adoption for Java and maintaining the "writeonce run anywhere compatibility promise."
